body_html: @kbsriram thanks for pointing out the bug. I am not a fan of mutable state, so my natural inclination is towards option 2. Adding TF_MUST_USE_RESULT to the generated API would simply point out the existing erroneous uses as compiler errors.
body_text: @kbsriram thanks for pointing out the bug. I am not a fan of mutable state, so my natural inclination is towards option 2. Adding TF_MUST_USE_RESULT to the generated API would simply point out the existing erroneous uses as compiler errors.
body: @kbsriram thanks for pointing out the bug. I am not a fan of mutable state, so my natural inclination is towards option 2. Adding `TF_MUST_USE_RESULT` to the generated API would simply point out the existing erroneous uses as compiler errors.
